verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Brethren, come see the tomb where Jesus lay,
That stone's been rolled away,
That stone's been rolled away,
Death cannot hold Him, much less the grave
Since that stone's been rolled away.
And now He's risen, And now He's reigning,
And from within my heart I'm singing songs of praise,
And now He's risen And now He's reigning,
Since that stone's been rolled away.
Lord roll that stone away, Release me from this grave
Make this hardened heart of mine
Soft as potter's clay,
And oh Lord, shed abroad, That precious love of God,
Oh Lord, roll that stone away.
